items.content_html: Audio Filter is a lightweight Chrome extension that allows users to apply a low-pass filter to all audio sources played in the browser. It's particularly useful for late-night browsing or for users who are sensitive to high-frequency sounds.
items.title: Jaldekoa/AudioFilter: Audio Filter is a lightweight Chrome extension that allows users to apply a low-pass filter to all audio sources played in the browser. It's particularly useful for late-night browsing or for users who are sensitive to high-frequency sounds.

items.content_html: A lightweight web tool to create and edit node-based graphs. Add nodes from a library, connect inputs and outputs with edges, and import/export graphs as JSON. Uses SVG for smooth interaction with edge highlighting and deletion. Ideal for visual workflows and prototyping.
items.title: x0sig/node_editor: A lightweight web tool to create and edit node-based graphs. Add nodes from a library, connect inputs and outputs with edges, and import/export graphs as JSON. Uses SVG for smooth interaction with edge highlighting and deletion. Ideal for visual workflows and prototyping.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: Ollama Client ‚Äì Chat with Local LLMs Inside Your Browser A lightweight, privacy-first Chrome extension to chat with locally hosted Ollama lllm models like LLaMA 2, Mistral, and CodeLLaMA. Supports streaming, stop/regenerate, markdown, and easy model switching ‚Äî all without cloud APIs or data leaks.

Supports streaming, stop/regenerate, markdown, and easy model switching ‚Äî all without cloud APIs or data leaks.
